    Sara Martino

    • Method Detail

      • refreshGestoreCinema

        private void refreshGestoreCinema()
        Refreshes the reference to the GestoreCinema of this app if it is present in the system. In case the manager has been unregistered, this function sets this.gestore to null.

        Returns false if the connection has not already been established or if the manager has been unregistered from the system by the admin.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password)
        Description copied from class: Applicazione
        Logs in the user corresponding to the specified username.

        Returns false if username or password are null, if there is no user with this username, if the password is wrong or if the user is already logged.

        Specified by:
        login in class Applicazione
        Returns:
        true if there is the login is successful, false otherwise

      • logout

        public boolean logout()
        Description copied from class: Applicazione
        Logs out the user logged to the application.

        Returns false if no user is logged to the application

        Specified by:
        logout in class Applicazione
        Returns:
        true if there is the logout is successful, false otherwise

      • inserisciNuovaSala

        public int inserisciNuovaSala(int cinemaId,
                     java.lang.String nomeSala,
                     int numeroFile,
                     int numeroPostiFila,
                     int tempoAttrezzaggio)
        Adds a new room to the rooms list of the cinema of the Gestore Cinema specified by the id passed as input.

        Returns -1 if the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged, if the id passed as input is not a valid id or if there is already a room with the same name.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        nomeSala - The name of the new room
        numeroFile - The number of seats row
        numeroPostiFila - The number of seats per row
        tempoAttrezzaggio - The setup time of the room
        Returns:
        The id of the room if the new room is added, -1 otherwise

      • eliminaSala

        public boolean eliminaSala(int cinemaId,
                  int idSala)
        Removes a room from the rooms list of the cinema of the Gestore Cinema specified by the id passed as input.

        Returns false if the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged, if the id passed as input is not a valid id or if there is no room with the specified id.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        idSala - The id of the room
        Returns:
        true if the room is removed, false otherwise

      • printRooms

        public boolean printRooms(int cinemaId)
        Prints the info of each room in the cinema of the Gestore Cinema specified by the id passed as input.

        Returns false if the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged, if the id passed as input is not a valid id or if the list of room is empty.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        Returns:
        true if the operation has been successful, false otherwise

      • printAllShows

        public boolean printAllShows(int cinemaId,
                    int salaId)
        Prints all the shows scheduled in the room (specified by the id passed as input) of the cinema (specified by the id passed as input).

        Returns false if the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged, if the id are not valid id or if there are no shows scheduled.

        Returns:
        true if the operation is successfully completed, false otherwise

      • printProfilo

        public boolean printProfilo()
        Prints the info of the GestoreCinema.

        Returns false if the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged.

        Returns:
        true if the operation has been successful, false otherwise

      • verifyRoomsAvailability

        public java.util.ArrayList<Sala> verifyRoomsAvailability(int cinemaId,
                                                Spettacolo spettacolo,
                                                int numberOfDays)
        Verify the availability of the rooms of the cinema (specified by the id passed as input) for a show passed as input depending on the number of days you want to keep it in schedule.

        Returns null if the id of the cinema passed as input is not a valid id or the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged; an empty list if no room is available.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        spettacolo - The show for which you want to check the availability of the rooms
        numberOfDays - The number of days you want to keep the show in schedule
        Returns:
        null in case of errors, the list of the available rooms if present, an empty list otherwise.

      • addShows

        public boolean addShows(int cinemaId,
               Spettacolo spettacolo,
               int numberOfDays,
               int idSala)
        Adds a show to the schedule of the cinema (specified by the id passed as input) depending on the number of days you want to keep it in schedule.

        Returns false if the id of the cinema passed as input is not a valid id, the GestoreCinema is not registered and logged, the idSala does not exist, the number of days is zero or if the sala specified by idSala is not available.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        spettacolo - The show to add
        numberOfDays - The number of days you want to keep the show in schedule
        idSala - The id of the sala in which you want to add the shows
        Returns:
        true if the operation is succesfully completed, false otherwise

      • hasCinema

        public boolean hasCinema(int cinemaId)
        Returns true if the gestore logged in this app has a cinema with this id.

        Returns false if the gestore is not registered and logged or if the id is not a valid id.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        Returns:
        true if the gestore registered and logged in this app has a cinema with this id, false otherwise

      • hasRoom

        public boolean hasRoom(int cinemaId,
              int roomId)
        Returns true if the cinema (specified by its id) of the gestore logged in this app has the room specified by its id passed as input.

        Returns false if the gestore is not registered and logged or if the id are not valid id.

        Parameters:
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        roomId - The id of the room
        Returns:
        true if the gestore registered and logged in this app has a cinema with cinemaId that contains a room with roomId, false otherwise

      • printAllCinema

        public boolean printAllCinema()
        Prints the info of each cinema of the manager logged in this app.

        Returns false if the user is not registered and logged or if the list of rooms is empty.

        Returns:
        true if the operation i succesfully completed, false otherwise

      • printRoomsFromList

        public void printRoomsFromList(java.util.ArrayList<Sala> rooms)
        Prints the info of each rooms in the list passed as input.
        Parameters:
        rooms - The list of film to print

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(java.lang.String email,
             java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Send a mail to the specified email address passed an input.

        In this first implementation this function is not implemented.

        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the recipient
        arguments - An array of objects to be used to create the mail
